name: Dark Enough to See
description:
A bus drops off a young girl in a hospital gown at an abandoned neighborhood on halloween night.

Made for Jam-O-Lantern 2022

Two-Player only

Human controls:

  • Move with WASD or Left Stick
  • Jump with Space or Left Trigger/Bumper or A
  • Aim projectile with Cursor or Right Stick
  • Fire projectile with Mouse click or Right Trigger/Bumper

Shadow controls:

  • Move with WASD or Left Stick
  • Jump/Wall Jump with Space or Left Trigger/Bumper or A
  • Melee attack with Mouse click or Right Trigger/Bumper

Known Bugs:
There are some issues with getting stuck on geometry, but with some finicking you can get free. A tip is to jump while standing still then move in midair.
